titleStmt.title: France, Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France, Latin 11003

persName.affiliation: University of Sorbonne Nouvelle, University of Paris Nanterre

availability.licence: Distributed under a Cretive Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International (CC BY-NC 4.0).

msItem.title: Charter number 118
msItem.rubric: De tribus deneriis census quictatis quos debebat Clausum de Verrone

msItem.title: Charter number 119
msItem.rubric: Quod Maria et filii eii sororum Ysabellis uxorum domini Odonis de Gonessa quitaverint nobis quicquid reclamabit Eiscopi in clauso de Verrone

supportDesc.foliation: Foliated 1-42 in dark brown ink on the top right corner of each recto.

layout.catchwords: There are decorated horizontal catchwords at center in lower margins on fols , and .
layout.signatures: The three catchwords found in the middle of the lower margins of the leaves serve as quire signatures.

handDesc.handNote: The manuscript is written in gothic textura by a single hand, Pantaleon da Crema.

decoDesc.decoNote: There are paragraph marks in red signalling the beginning of sentences throughout the manuscript.

additions.p: There are marginal annotations and corrections on fols , , , , by different hands.

binding.p: Modern. Quarter leather and paperboard binding with marbled pastedowns.

origin.origDate: The end of the fourteenth century.

history.provenance: There is an owership mark on fol. 42v that reads Iste liber est mei Angelli de Sanguineis de Roma, indicating that the manuscript was owned by Angelo de Sanguineis de Roma.
France, Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France, Latin 8025 was also written by Pantalemone da Crema and owned by Angelo de Sanguineis de Roma.
The manuscript was later in the possession of the Visconti family, also based in Pavia.
history.acquisition: The manuscript was acquired by the Bibliothèque nationale de France in Paris from the library of King Henry IV.

recordHist.source: First catalogued on 1832 as a part of cartularies of the imperial library
recordHist.change: Catalogued updated as a part of Suppl.1 n°541
Catalogued updated as a part of latin fond (LAT) and named LAT 11003

surrogates.p: A facsimile of the manuscript is available on Gallica.

div.p: Symonis de Poissiaco militis et C. uxoris ejus qui quittavint ecclesie karoliloci quic quid reclamabunt in nemoribus dicte ecclesie qui sunt de feodo de Mellou ad grangiam de commellis pertinentibus nichil omnino de certo reclamare M CC XXX IIII

Radulphi Buticularii qui in puram elemosinam dedit ecclesie karoliloci totum nemus suum situs in loco qui dictiur les aines inter nemus dicte ecclesie et nemus q? dominorum perpetuo possedendum. M CC L

Matildis comitisse Boloniem que concessit donum et elemosinam quam fecit ecclesie karoliloci Radom phus quondam buticularii de nemore quod dicitur les alues suo apud commellas que concessit ele mosinam quam facit idem R; prefate ecclesie de octo modiis avene recipiendis annuatim apud borrez quos B. dedit ad sustenta? C lebrarium M CC LV Cartam dmonie Radul phi de dono hujus avene requ? in titulo de possessionibus acta abbatiam.

Guillermi de Chantilli militis qui remisis petitur et quittavit omnem querelam quod move rat aversis ecclesiam karoliloci super noemore dicte eccleisie nemobus Ysembart un super omnes vuas usita tas vereres et consuetas usqum per terras suas et ne mora fratribus dicte eccelsie concessit libere et quiete perpe tuo possidendas concessit in super ut ? dictorum religiosum aras suagittas et aru? libere et ? possuit ubsquem dbere. M CC XXXIIII
Johannis de Nantoillet qui quittavit gran gieram quam reclemabat in nemoribus ? de commellis qui sunt de feodo de Mellou M CC XXXVII

Domini Johannis de Chan tilli militis et du? Johane uxeris sue qui c? ? concentis in ? ex una parte et ecclesia karoliloci ex altera super vidersis pertinens in d? super duodecim libratis annum redditur quos gui ? ?? ip? assignaverat ad quandam capellannam facidendam in ecclesia predicta ? super es quod sibi venditabar garennam in nemore abbatis sito inter viam que ducit de commellis ?? et ne? ipsius quod dicit bus ysembart actem super eo quod dicebat que pastores dicte ecclesie no poterans ?? sua ducem sine lettra per io ea in quibus que reclamabat gueriam ? dem bonorum ?? censu prefatus Johanne
